title: Outfit a PC with Microsoft’s latest OS for less than $25
content:
Macworld

When their computer starts lagging, many people think it’s time for a whole new machine. However, that’s not usually necessary, as a new operating system (OS) is often all they need to give their computer a new life.

If your PC is running slower than usual or you simply haven’t updated your OS recently, this could be a great time to do so. Microsoft’s latest OS, Windows 11 Pro, is currently on sale for only $24.97 (reg. $199) through April 2!

This OS is designed to offer updated productivity features, advanced security measures, AI-powered assistance, and more. First, you’ll get snap layouts, widget customization, improved voice typing, and more for daily productivity.

Windows 11 Pro’s security is also impressive, as it offers biometric login, TPM 2.0, Smart App Control, BitLocker encryption, and extra advanced antivirus defenses. Users can rest easier knowing their information and PC are protected from unwanted tampering.

In addition, Windows 11 Pro gets a boost from AI enhancements. Its new AI-powered assistant, Windows Copilot, can support you by providing document summaries, launching playlists, and answering questions to streamline your day. And on your off time, you can enjoy an enhanced gaming experience from the DirectX 12 Ultimate, which offers incredible graphic support.

You can get lifetime access to Windows 11 Pro for just $24.97 when you order through April 2 at 11:59 PM Pacific. No coupon required!
